description:
22 was invited by a game company to try out their virtual reality game "Sea in a Box". In the game world, in a fishing village along the southern coast, villagers took the statues of gods worshipped by each household to the streets to celebrate the Lantern Festival. 22 and three other test players discovered a female god "Cizhou Saint Aunt" who had never been seen before. As they explored the origins of "Cizhou Saint Aunt", they gradually discovered traces of human tampering from outside the game, and a mysterious force was subtly influencing the NPCs in the game. On the other hand, 22`s sister 33 also discovered the strange behavior of employees outside the game. Companies with ulterior motives, NPC fishermen who secretly planned mysterious rituals, and companions who seemed to have their own secrets. A huge conspiracy intertwined with multiple forces gradually surfaced.
source: bgm.tv/googletranslate
